title: KGMU Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Project Technical Support III Posts
description: The King George's Medical University (KGMU) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Project Technical Support Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their M.Sc. Nursing, M.Sc., and M.Pharm can apply for the KGMU Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selecti...
